Q_DESC:
There are 4 circles drawn on a chart. (c1, c2, c3 and c4). Circle c1 has a connecter to c2 and c3.(ie. c1,c2  c3 are adjacent) Circle c2 has a connector to c3, c4 other than c1. 

Circle c4 has a connector to c3 other than c2. c1 and c2 comes on the upper plane and c3, c4 lower respectively. Write a program to color the circles in such a way that no two adjacent circles has the same color.
